attributes.title: BAD 🤮

attributes.title: This app is terrible
attributes.review: The aesthetic of the entire app is completely disgusting his plans for America is completely disgusting. Take this app down delete it completely obliterate it.

attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: It was laggy black screen so I couldn’t do anything and to many adds after another spams glitches viruses death threats other stuff

attributes.title: it called my grandma ugly on her birthday
attributes.review: I downloaded the app and showed it to my grandma who was looking at my phone it hacked my camera and once it saw her face it started flashing red saying UGLY WARNING she was so hurt she had a heart attack and died

attributes.title: Infectious app
attributes.review: This app is awful it doesn’t work. Whenever I try to use it my phone glitches out. This app gave my phone hundreds of viruses. This app needs to be banned!!!!! 🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬

attributes.title: Terrible.
attributes.review: Not here from tiktok like the rest of the reviews. I have tried it and it keeps on taking me out. Seriously?! What the heck. Apps like these should just get out of the apple store.

attributes.title: ✨no thank you✨
attributes.review: Woke up again today realizing my nightmare that trump is president isn’t a nightmare. I want a full refund and apology from the manager of the US immediately. This app is also really bad.

was promised if i downloaded and opened the app my kpop boys would come and sing me goodnight. but when i opened it i saw this cheeto lookin oompa loompa🤢. this app is a 0/10 DO NOT RECOMMEND!!! save your eyes and do not download!!
